articles.title: Donald Trump threatens new 50% tariffs on China - BBC
articles.description: The US president said he will introduce the extra tariff unless China withdraws its own 34% counter-tariff on American goods.
articles.content:
Emma Haslett
Donald Trump has threatened China with an extra tariff of 50% on goods imported into the US if it does not withdraw a countermeasure it announced on Friday.

articles.title: Judge says deportation of man to El Salvador prison is ‘wholly lawless,’ with deadline to return him to America today - CNN
articles.description: The Trump administration has until 11:59 p.m. Monday to return to the United States a Maryland man who the government admits was accidentally deported to a high-security prison in El Salvador.
articles.content:

articles.title: Palestinian-American boy killed by Israeli forces in West Bank - BBC
articles.description: The Israeli military says its troops shot Omar Rabea, 14, and two other boys because they were throwing stones towards a highway.
articles.content:
A Palestinian-American teenager has been killed by Israeli forces in the occupied West Bank, Palestinian officials say.
